title: vidhuruni vindha vijayeebhava
sahitya:
Vijayeebhava!  Vijayeebhava!  Viduruni  Vinda Vijayeebhava! 

        Viduruni  Vinda  Vijayeebhava  Hridayiswara  Vijayeebhava

        Viduruni  Vinda  Vijayeebhava,  Viduruni  Vinda  Vijayeebhava

        Vijayeebhava  Jaya  Jaya  Jaya (3 x ascending) 

        Vijayeebhava  Jaya  Jaya  Jaya (3 x descending) 

        Vijayeebhava  Vijayeebhava  Vijayeebhava  Vijayeebhava

        Vijayeeebhava Vijayeebhava   Vijayeebhava Vijayeebhava

        Viduruni  Vinda  Vijayeebhava  Hridayiswara  Vijayeebhava

        Viduruni  Vinda  Vijayeebhava,  Viduruni  Vinda  Vijayeebhava

Vivilaku  Neeku  Vijayeebhava

Sri  Valbhaguna  Chinthaa  Saagara

Eevallaneedi  Vijayeebhava,  Eevallaneedi  Vijayeebhava

        Vijayeebhava  Jaya  Jaya  Jaya (3 x ascending) 

Vijayeebhava  Jaya  Jaya  Jaya (3 x descending) 

        Vijayeebhava  Vijayeebhava  Vijayeebhava  Vijayeebhava

        Vijayeeebhava Vijayeebhava Vijayeebhava Vijayeebhava 

(Viduruni)
